item.title: Weekly Rundown 1 (24 October_30 October)
item.description: What have I been up to? I decided to start this new project where I write about all the cool stuff that happened each week. I will try to post one of these everyweek, starting now (last week of October 2021). To help achieve this, I created a python script that automaticly create a post with some template text. import datetime import calendar import os def getSundayDate(weekday, date): switcher = { "Monday": 1, "Tuesday": 2, "Wednesday": 3, "Thursday": 4, "Friday": 5, "Saturday": 6, "Sunday": 0 } difference = switcher.
